mapper:
insert into loss_pro(lossprojectid,reportid,policyid,lossmoney,report_status,remarks) values(${lossprojectid},${reportid},${policyid},${lossmoney},#{report_status},#{remarks})
<select id="findbyId" parameterType="cn.sz.zl.pojo.Loss_Pro" resultMap="cn.sz.zl.pojo.Loss_Pro""> select lossprojectid,reportid,policyid,lossmoney,report_status,remarks where lossprojectid=${lossprojectid}
